title: NO power outages on Friday (15); 2 hour cuts for weekend
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The Ceylon Electricity Board said there will be NO power cuts on Friday (15).
However, it noted that the supply of electricity will be suspended for 2 hours and 15 minutes during the weekend.
Litro Gas Chairman decides to step down, sends resignation letter to President
UL says leases expiring & aircraft must be returned; looking at replacement leases
